message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I believe its value to you is significant, and I'm confident it will be a game-changer for your business. My initial offer is $900,000. I'm open to discussing this further, but I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, considering my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $900,000 price point. I would like to propose an offer of $750,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your financial constraints. While I believe this product is worth more than $750,000, I'm willing to compromise. I'm offering a slightly reduced price of $850,000. I'm confident this price reflects both the value of the product and our desire to reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $800,000. This aligns closely with the value I place on the product and also respects my budget constraints.
